education.thesis: Resolution analysis of transient electromagnetic sounding curves.

roles.roletitle: Chairman Of The Board - EAGE Student Chapter Cracow
roles.description: As a chairman my responsibilities included communications with EAGE, arranging sponsorship for GEOSFERA Annual Workshops, and coordinating the board's tasks. Alike the year before, my quiz team managed to score top 3 in the online geo quiz and was awarded travel grants to the annual EAGE conference in Amsterdam, but due to COVID19, the conference was postponed.

My main responsibilities as Chapter's spokesman included managing communications with students and Geophone Student Geophysical Society, organizing chapter meetings and workshops, and creating media materials for our Facebook page which I managed. During my time as spokesman, our chapter was voted no.1 Student Chapter and was awarded the 2000Є prize. The quiz team led by me managed to score top 3 in online geo-quiz and was awarded travel grants to an annual EAGE conference in London, where I and my colleagues managed to beat every other team and win the main prize.

My and my colleague's work by recognized by EAGE. We were awarded travel grants and conference tickets for the 2018 EAGE Annual Conference, where we had presented our findings. The abstract is available on earthdoc.org.

link.text: P. Ułasiewicz, M. Ziobro 2018, Lateral Range Issue in ERT - Analogue Modelling with 2D and Quasi-3D Inversion

roles.description: As the team leader and originator, I was tasked with assembling a team of geologists, geophysicists, and petroleum engineers, creating promotional materials for my team, and presenting our work during bi-weekly meetings. For our task of finding oil, I was the main geophysicist and petrophysist. I had the honor of presenting our results during Annual SEG Meeting 2019 in San Antonio, TX.

As a survey supervisor, I have organized and conducted geophysical surveys in Tyniec, Cracow. I was also a member of the organizing committee for the 11th National Geophysical Workshop "Geosfera 2018".
As a member of the Geophone Student Society, I participated and helped in organizing various events and workshops.

works.title: Camp Advisor

works.description: Location tracking react-native app. Made with expo-cli. Backend on expressjs and mongodb.

works.title: ProjectPoller
works.description: React polling web app. Uses Google OAuth for authorization, Stripe for payment processing, and sendgrid for message dispatch. Expressjs and mongodb backend.
